main event: A resident reported a sighting of a single object with lights traveling at high speed over San Bernardino, California.
interesting points: The object was reported to have lights that did not blink and descended towards the coast,The object traveled at a speed of 4,000-5,000 knots,The witness described the object as either flat or cigar-shaped and approximately 15 feet long,There were no sounds associated with the object,The sighting lasted for about 5 seconds.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with lights
